get.description: Retrieve a list of available destination connectors.

post.description: Create a new destination connector using the provided configuration and name.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific destination connector by its ID.

put.description: Update the configuration of an existing destination connector.

delete.description: Delete a specific destination connector by its ID.

post.description: Initiate a connection check for the destination connector

get.summary: Get the latest destination connector connection check
get.description: Retrieves the most recent connection check for the specified destination connector.
Retrieve a list of available source connectors.

post.description: Create a new source connector using the provided configuration and name.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific source connector by its ID.

delete.description: Delete a specific source connector identified by its ID.

put.description: Update the configuration of an existing source connector.

post.description: Initiates a connection check for the specified source connector.

get.summary: Get the latest source connector connection check
get.description: Retrieves the most recent connection check for the specified source connector.
Retrieve a list of jobs with optional filtering by workflow ID or job status.
Retrieve detailed information for a specific job by its ID.
Download the output of a job from a workflow where the input file was provided at runtime.

schema.description: ID of the file to download

get.description: Retrieve processing details for a specific job by its ID.
Retrieve failed files for a specific job by its ID.

post.description: Create a new workflow, either custom or auto, and configure its settings.

get.description: Retrieve a list of workflows, optionally filtered by source, destination, state, name, date range, and supports pagination and sorting.
Retrieve detailed information for a specific workflow by its ID.

put.description: Update an existing workflow's name, connectors, schedule, or workflow type.

delete.description: Delete a workflow by its ID.

post.description: Run a workflow by triggering a new job if none is currently active.
